bug_report.Title: In the chat store, when you type a message on the left side of the screen displays a part of the main page
bug_report.STR: 1.Go to https://www.com click tap 2.Click on the message icon in the lower right corner 3.Click on the message input field
bug_report.Expected: Store chat is displayed in full screen
bug_report.Actual: Part of the home page is displayed on the left side of the screen
